item.title: US Biopharmaceutical Company Liminatus Pharma Plans to Raise $500 Million to Invest in BNB
item.description: July 28th. As per a report from businessinsider, the clinical-stage biopharmaceutical company Liminatus Pharma, Inc. (NASDAQ: LIMN) announced today that it has planned to strategically expand into the cryptocurrency and blockchain domain.The company intends to set up a subsidiary named "American BNB Strategy" to take the lead in its digital asset investment and management scheme. By means of this platform, Liminatus plans to gradually raise and allocate up to $500 million in funds, with the aim of making strategic long-term investments in BNB.Liminatus stressed that although the company remains fully dedicated to its core business - advancing cancer treatments and pancreatic cancer diagnostic technologies, expanding into the digital asset space is regarded as a necessary measure to support long-term growth and enhance shareholder value.Liminatus is a clinical-stage biopharmaceutical company that focuses on developing immunotherapies for cancer patients. The company is progressing

item.title: The DePIN Project Starpower will take an airdrop snapshot on August 4th at 8:00 AM.
item.description: On July 28th, the Decentralized Power Infrastructure Network (DePIN) project Starpower announced on social media that its airdrop snapshot will be carried out on August 4th at 08:00 (Beijing time).

item.title: Japanese nail art chain Convano has announced another round of funding of 1.5 billion yen to increase its BTC holdings.
item.description: On July 28th, as per market information, the Japanese nail salon chain operator Convano Co., Ltd. acquired approximately 80 bitcoins during the previous week. Additionally, it recently announced another round of financing amounting to 1.5 billion yen (approximately $10.1 million), and the funds will be utilized to enhance its holdings of bitcoins.

item.title: Binance Alpha will launch GAIA (GAIA) on July 30th
item.description: On July 28th, as per official channels, Binance Alpha is set to list GAIA (GAIA) on July 30th. Qualified users can utilize Alpha Points on the Alpha event page to claim the airdrop, which can be claimed once trading commences. Further details will be made public shortly.

item.title: 4 Whale Addresses withdrew a total of approximately 123,000 SOL from CEXs within a day
item.description: On July 28th, according to the monitoring of LookOnChain, 4 whale addresses collectively withdrew approximately 123,269 SOL from CEX within a day. These include:路 The address 7VbjYZ withdrew 58,700 SOL from Binance 16 hours ago (with a value of $11 million).路 The address BnwZvG withdrew 38,000 SOL from Binance in the past 5 hours (with a value of $7.3 million).路 The address 2AbHLS withdrew 14,569 SOL from Binance 2 hours ago (with a value of $2.8 million).路 The address KMhcqN withdrew 12,000 SOL from Kraken 14 hours ago (with a value of $2.25 million).

item.title: BTCS announced that it has increased its holding of 14,240 ETH, surpassing a total of 70,000 ETH held.
item.description: On July 28th, as per official information, BTCS Inc. made an announcement regarding an increase in its holdings by 14,240 ETH, raising its total holdings to 70,028 ETH. Given an Ethereum price of $3,850, the current holdings are valued at around $270 million.Furthermore, the official statement pointed out that BTCS has successfully completed a $10 million convertible note offering. The conversion price for this financing is $13 per share, which represents a 198% premium over BTCS's closing price on July 18, 2025.Influenced by this news, the pre-market trading of BTCS in the US stock market witnessed an extended increase of 10.24%, with a pre-market price of $5.6.

item.title: Affected by the Purchase of 14,000 ETH, BTCS Pre-market Gain Expanded to 10.24%
item.description: On July 28th, based on Rockflow data, likely influenced by the news of acquiring an extra 14,000 ETH, the pre-market gain of BTCS expanded to 10.24%, with a pre-market price of $5.60.Previously, BTCS Inc. announced the acquisition of 14,240 ETH, raising its total holdings to 70,028 ETH.

item.title: Nano Labs has increased its BNB holdings to 128,000 tokens, with a total value exceeding $100 million.
item.description: On July 28th, the US-listed company Nano Labs announced that it has boosted its holdings of BNB to 128,000 coins. With the current price of BNB at $850 per coin, the total value of the company's BNB strategic reserve has exceeded $108 million. This represents the latest move made by Nano Labs in its long-term BNB reserve strategy.

item.title: US Stock Nano Labs Surges Over 10% in Pre-market Trading, Currently Trading at $8.03
item.description: On July 28th, according to Rockflow market data, the pre-market trading of US stock Nano Labs surged by more than 10% and is currently at $8.03.Previously, Nano Labs announced that it has raised its holdings of BNB to 128,000 coins. Based on the current price of $850 per BNB, the total value of the company's BNB strategic reserve has exceeded $108 million.

item.title: BNB Chain Foundation Buys $25,000 of SOLV and CA
item.description: On July 28th, the BNB Chain Foundation provided incentives to certain addresses, with these addresses purchasing $25,000 worth of SOLV and CA tokens respectively.
